oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Boy Scouts clothing drive for the Victory Committee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four boys move bags of clothing from the back of a truck through a doorway.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boy Scouts of America (Oak Ridge, Tenn.); Boys; Clothing relief; Community service
Arms, Bill; Coleburn; Jack; King, Henry; Wright, Donald
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This image appeared on page one of the January 31, 1946 issue of the Oak Ridge Journal. Left to right are Donald Wright, Bill Arms, Henry King and Jack Coleburn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
